EmailTemplate.subject: Your link to the "Retail Apps Report" by Pivotal Labs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Download Your Free Report from Pivotal Labs <http://play.gopivotal.com/rs/pivotal/images/PL-Report-UK-Retail-Apps-Report-Q214.pdf>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your interest in the "U.K. Retail Apps Report 2014" by Pivotal Labs.
Click here to access the report <http://play.gopivotal.com/rs/pivotal/images/PL-Report-UK-Retail-Apps-Report-Q214.pdf>.
If you have any questions, reply to this email and we'll respond right away.
Sincerely, JB Steadman Pivotal Labs London
